data.title: Episode 1: How to use Social Media to Grow Your Podcast
data.description: Using social media will help your podcast grow. Kyle and I share the most important lessons we've learned and talk through how important social is for podcasters.

data.title: Episode 0: Welcome to IronMicâ€™d
data.description:
Welcome to the launch of IronMic, a simple place to create automated podcast websites. Learn about the people behind the project. Leon Hitchens, Kyle McDonald, Sunny Singh talk about how they met, what lead them to this project, and what you will expect from this podcast for podcasters. 

You can find us on Anchor and podcast.ironmic.fm!
